content: Even though Trang continued to say that she loved him, Spenser couldn't do anything but fear that she would stop caring for him.
translations: ita:Nonostante Trang continui a dire di amarlo, Spenser non pu√≤ fare a meno di aver paura che lei smetta di volergli bene
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by odiernod (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
